results.title: The Effect and Possible Mechanism of Intradiscal Injection of Simvastatin in the Treatment of Discogenic Pain in Rats
results.text_hl: In the control group, only L4/5 IVD was exposed; in the @<m>DISEASE_Dowling_Degos_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562924 @@@DDD@@@ group, the ventral side of the L4/5 IVD was slowly punctured with a 25G needle; in the @<m>DISEASE_Dowling_Degos_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562924 @@@DDD@@@ + GEL group, the L4/5 IVD was punctured and the hydrogel was injected through a micro syringe; In the @<m>DISEASE_Dowling_Degos_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562924 @@@DDD@@@ + SIM group, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (3 mg/mL) was injected through a microsyringe while puncturing the L4/5 IVD.

citations.NLM: Huang X, Zheng C, Wang W, Ye X, Lin CY, Wu Z. The Effect and Possible Mechanism of Intradiscal Injection of Simvastatin in the Treatment of Discogenic Pain in Rats Front Neurosci. 2021;15():642436. PMID: 33815046
